title: 101 Apple Computer Programming Tips and Tricks By Fred White ABE

101 Apple Computer Programming Tips and Tricks By Fred White ABEE
___
 <a href="
http://beeimg.com/images/x76891854712.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://beeimg.com/images/x76891854712.jpg</a>

About:
__

The APPLE Computer is one of the world's most
popular computer systems. Its lightweight, desktop design
and powerful version of the BASIC programming language
place it at the forefront of the new wave of personal
computers for home, school and office.
Anything but a toy, its hardware configuration and
system software make it a highly useful tool in the business
environment and the classroom as weil as for practical jobs
around the home.
In fact, the system software is so flexible and versatile
that the need for this book became apparent. There are so
many computer tasks which can be accomplished with the
APPLE system that an introduction to the many techniques
is needed.
Software programs are what make a computer do what
you want. This book is written for those newcomers and
beginners, as weil as advanced novices and student
programmers, who would like to tap the vast resources
available in the APPLE computer package. This book, it is
hoped, will guide and instruct and provide insights into the
many ways the BASIC language built into the APPLE
computer can be put to use.
This book is a companion volume to 33 New APPLE
Computer Programs for Home, School & Office.

                                                       - From Preface

Paperback: 128 pages
Publisher: Arcsoft Pub 
Language: English
ISBN-10: 0866680152
ISBN-13: 978-0866680158
